dc:title: Dire Need of Hospitality House For Christ's Poor!
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Describes the poor they serve and a nearby dilapidated tenement they could acquire for hospitality but which needs extensive repairs.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 611 1950-06-01 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
